item.title: Jacinta add a quote by Angela Jeffs
item.description: "We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience." Teilhard de Chardin - French geologist, Jesuit priest, philosopher, mystic (1881-1955)" -- Angela Jeffs

item.title: Jacinta add a quote by Greta Garbo
item.description: "Life would be so wonderful if we only knew what to do with it. " -- Greta Garbo

item.title: Jacinta add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "I have a lot of faith. But I am also afraid a lot, and have no real certainty about anything. I remembered something Father Tom had told me--that the opposite of faith is not doubt, but certainty. Certainty is missing the point entirely. Faith includes noticing the mess, the emptiness and discomfort, and letting it be there until some light returns." -- Anne Lamott
